member.name: M:DirectShowLib.MultimediaStreaming.MsError.ThrowExceptionForHR(System.Int32)
member.summary: If hr has a "failed" status code (E_*), throw an exception. Note that status messages (S_*) are not considered failure codes. If DES or DShow error text is available, it is used to build the exception, otherwise a generic com error is thrown.

member.name: T:DirectShowLib.BDA.RunningStatus
member.summary: Define possible values for a running_status field according to ETSI EN 300 468 This enum doesn't exist in the c++ headers

member.name: T:DirectShowLib.AMMediaType
member.summary: From AM_MEDIA_TYPE - When you are done with an instance of this class, it should be released with FreeAMMediaType() to avoid leaking

member.name: M:DirectShowLib.IMediaSample.GetMediaType(DirectShowLib.AMMediaType@)
member.summary: Returned object must be released with DsUtils.FreeAMMediaType()

member.name: M:DirectShowLib.IEnumPins.Next(System.Int32,DirectShowLib.IPin[],System.IntPtr)
member.summary: The Next method retrieves a specified number of pins in the enumeration sequence.
member.param: Array of size cPins that is filled with IPin pointers. The caller must release the interfaces.
Pointer to a variable that receives the number of pins retrieved.
member.returns: Returns one of the following HRESULT values. S_FALSE - Did not retrieve as many pins as requested. S_OK - Success. E_INVALIDARG - Invalid argument. E_POINTER - null pointer argument. VFW_E_ENUM_OUT_OF_SYNC - The filter's state has changed and is now inconsistent with the enumerator.
member.remarks: This method retrieves pointers to the specified number of pins, starting at the current position in the enumeration, and places them in the specified array. If the method succeeds, the IPin pointers all have outstanding reference counts.Be sure to release them when you are done. If the number of pins changes, the enumerator is no longer consistent with the filter, and the method returns VFW_E_ENUM_OUT_OF_SYNC. Discard any data obtained from previous calls to the enumerator, because it might be invalid.Update the enumerator by calling the method. You can then call the Next method safely.

member.name: M:DirectShowLib.IEnumPins.Skip(System.Int32)
member.summary: The Skip method skips over a specified number of pins.
member.returns: Returns one of the following HRESULT S_FALSE - Skipped past the end of the sequence. S_OK - Success. VFW_E_ENUM_OUT_OF_SYNC - The filter's state has changed and is now inconsistent with the enumerator.

member.name: M:DirectShowLib.IEnumPins.Reset
member.summary: The Reset method resets the enumeration sequence to the beginning.

member.name: M:DirectShowLib.IEnumPins.Clone(DirectShowLib.IEnumPins@)
member.summary: The Clone method makes a copy of the enumerator with the same enumeration state.
member.param: Receives a pointer to the interface of the new enumerator. The caller must release the interface.
member.returns: Returns one of the following HRESULT S_FALSE - Did not retrieve as many pins as requested. S_OK - Success. E_OUTOFMEMORY - Insufficient memory. E_POINTER - null pointer argument. VFW_E_ENUM_OUT_OF_SYNC - The filter's state has changed and is now inconsistent with the enumerator.
member.remarks: If the number of pins changes, the enumerator is no longer consistent with the filter, and the method returns VFW_E_ENUM_OUT_OF_SYNC. Discard any data obtained from previous calls to the enumerator, because it might be invalid. Update the enumerator by calling the method. You can then call the Clone method safely.

member.name: M:DirectShowLib.DES.DESError.ThrowExceptionForHR(System.Int32)
member.summary: If hr has a "failed" status code (E_*), throw an exception. Note that status messages (S_*) are not considered failure codes. If DES or DShow error text is available, it is used to build the exception, otherwise a generic com error is thrown.

member.name: M:DirectShowLib.DsCAUUID.ToGuidArray
member.summary: Perform a manual marshaling of pElems to retrieve an array of System.Guid. Assume this structure has been already filled by the ISpecifyPropertyPages.GetPages() method.
member.returns: A managed representation of pElems (cElems items)

member.summary: Scan's a filter's pins looking for a pin with the specified category

Zero based index (ie 2 will return the third pin of the specified category)
member.returns: The matching pin, or null if not found
